summary: AlphaFill enriches AlphaFold protein structure predictions by transplanting small molecules and ions from homologous structures, significantly expanding the functional context of predicted models.
key_claims: AlphaFill transplants 12,029,789 compounds into 586,137 AlphaFold models.

_title: AlphaFill: enriching AlphaFold models with ligands and cofactors
_abstract: y already been placed within 3.5 Å of the centroid of the compound to be fitted (originating from a previously considered homolog). All AlphaFill models and metadata are stored in the AlphaFill databank. Further details on the procedure are available in the Methods.
